message:
SYSTEM: 4._methodologies-Espec-OL.pdf: Página 16
Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
. 
Ontology Specification is a collection of requirements 
that the ontology should fulfill, 
e.g. reasons to build the ontology,
target group, intended uses, possibly reached 
through a consensus process
speaker: SYSTEM
